<h3 id="X30331">X(30331) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-HONSBERGER AND TRINH</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^3-5*(b+c)*a^2+2*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30331) = 3*X(1)-X(7) = 5*X(1)-X(4312) = X(1)-3*X(8236) = 5*X(1)-3*X(11038) = 5*X(1)+X(30332) = 11*X(1)-5*X(30340) = 4*X(1)-X(30424) = X(7)+3*X(390) = 5*X(7)-3*X(4312) = 2*X(7)-3*X(5542) = X(7)-9*X(8236) = 5*X(7)-9*X(11038) = 5*X(7)+3*X(30332) = 11*X(7)-15*X(30340) = 4*X(7)-3*X(30424) = 3*X(10)-4*X(6666) = 5*X(390)+X(4312) = 2*X(390)+X(5542) = X(390)+3*X(8236) = X(1000)+3*X(3488) = 3*X(1001)-2*X(6666)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(5092). X(30331) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30331) lies on these lines:
{1,7}, {3,21625}, {8,25101}, {9,519}, {10,1001}, {35,7677}, {36,7676}, {40,6744}, {55,3911}, {57,10385}, {65,20116}, {80,2346}, {142,214}, {144,3241}, {145,5223}, {165,10580}, {226,3058}, {319,3883}, {354,4031}, {392,3059}, {496,3826}, {497,3817}, {515,6767}, {517,5572}, {518,3244}, {673,29571}, {758,15185}, {938,21153}, {942,5493}, {944,11372}, {946,5719}, {950,954}, {971,5882}, {997,3174}, {999,11495}, {1056,28164}, {1058,1125}, {1156,7972}, {1210,3746}, {1279,3755}, {1317,2801}, {1445,5119}, {1479,3947}, {1621,4847}, {1699,10578}, {1757,4924}, {1890,6198}, {2321,4702}, {2802,10177}, {3057,5728}, {3158,20103}, {3189,12447}, {3243,5698}, {3247,5819}, {3333,12512}, {3475,9580}, {3486,10384}, {3586,8232}, {3625,6541}, {3632,5686}, {3679,18230}, {3689,5316}, {3731,5838}, {3753,12732}, {3870,21060}, {3871,8582}, {3874,12710}, {3898,15733}, {3938,4656}, {3957,17484}, {4078,17765}, {4085,16593}, {4421,6692}, {4428,5745}, {4660,21255}, {4684,17361}, {4882,5129}, {5045,10386}, {5234,6764}, {5274,10171}, {5441,16133}, {5697,7672}, {5726,19925}, {5759,7982}, {5762,24680}, {5766,10398}, {5805,13464}, {5817,5881}, {5851,12735}, {5902,11025}, {5903,7673}, {5918,10569}, {6068,25416}, {6690,24386}, {6765,18250}, {7671,18412}, {7674,9623}, {7678,7951}, {7679,7741}, {8238,30366}, {8255,20330}, {8387,30374}, {8388,30423}, {8389,30411}, {8543,10572}, {8581,10543}, {8715,9843}, {8732,30282}, {9577,29815}, {9778,10980}, {9797,11106}, {9819,16236}, {10175,18527}, {10179,15587}, {10390,18490}, {10392,10950}, {10865,30294}, {11362,12433}, {11373,15808}, {11526,30323}, {11529,28228}, {12053,15950}, {12702,17706}, {13159,16137}, {13411,23708}, {15171,21620}, {15174,15570}, {15933,18421}, {15934,28194}, {16173,20119}, {17023,20533}, {17601,24216}, {17603,18240}, {17715,17725}, {18530,26446}, {21454,30350}, {21617,30384}, {24175,29820}</p>
<p>
X(30331) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 390}, {80, 12730}, {145, 5223}, {944, 11372}, {1156, 7972}, {3057, 5728}, {3243, 5698}, {3632, 12630}, {4294, 12560}, {4312, 30332}, {5441, 16133}, {5697, 7672}, {5759, 7982}, {5903, 7673}, {6068, 25416}, {10624, 12573}<br>
X(30331) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10, 1001), (65, 20116), (2550, 1125), (3625, 24393), (5542, 1), (5805, 13464), (13159, 16137), (14563, 15935), (24393, 15254), (30329, 5572), (30424, 5542)<br>
X(30331) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 20, 12577), (1, 10624, 3671), (11038, 30332, 4312)<br>
</p>
<hr class="gray">
